name: Ausangate Trek.
description: This great trek journey will take you to explore the surroundings of the mighty Ausangate Mountain (6.372m/20900ft), passing throughout beautiful Andean villages, amazing turquoise lagoons and natural hot springs. Ausangate Trek offers you a real taste of the Andean life, as you will find and see little communities where native still speak the Inca language and where traditional methods of life are still used. So if you are wishing to do a genuine Peruvian trek out of the beaten track then this is the right excursion for you. This is a spectacular trip for seasoned trekkers who love a true outdoor adventure. During our adventure we will be well taken care of by our professional team of English speaking guides, cooks and wranglers with their mules.
